text.intro:
Yak Network Map is an internal experiment for active Yaks who share common domain-interest(s). 

-> Hover on a node to see its connections (visible nodes), rest of the map will get hidden.  
-> Node Color signifies the openness of the yak for receiving DMs (green: DMs open for collaboration opportunities; yellow: DMs open for starting conversation; blue: prefer to not receive unsolicited DMs)
-> Thick edge signifies multiple shared-interests between those nodes.
-> Learn more about this project in the #yak-network-map channel on the Yak Collective Discord Server.
text.title: Yak Network Map
